title: Typography rap
content:
I’m so leaned, my verses in italic  
I always come hard, my flow be phallic  
Rhymes so clever, yeah I’m a smart aleck  
My gat like movable type, hella metallic  
I don’t beat around the bush  
I don’t speak oblique  
Your future looking bleak  
I know your girl a freak  
We doing positions like a ligature  
Kama Sutra, she read that literature  
This song ain’t over, this just the overture

Hop up in the Cadillac, I’m riding slab serif  
I run this town, everybody call me the sheriff  
A nick gets sold in the park, I gets paid a tariff  
My flow got the manual kerning  
Son, you best get to learning  
If you yearning for what I’m earning  
My enemies, I leave ‘em burning  
With jealousy. F\*ck with me  
I put bullet holes in your organs  
Leave your wife a widow and your kid an orphan  
Wack emcees, I don’t listen to y’all raps  
Come at me with your crew, I’m peeling all caps  
At every concert I get mobbed by fans  
I’m Times New Roman, you Comic Sans
author: 2 Katz

comments.content:
I made a few changes to improve the wording. They're on [my blog](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821065211/http:/kwraps.tumblr.com/post/47937951004/typography).

Everyone, feel free to add to this. I'm sure there's a lot of terms I haven't thought of. Even if you can't make a rhyme, just give me a couple words and I'll see what I can do.

I'm trying to add the line "Shout out to Johannes Gutenberg" but not sure how to rhyme it.
What could be more excruciating than exposing “rap” to a coven of typography nerds sitting at their computers?

MORE! WE WANT MORE!

> What could be more excruciating than exposing “rap” to a coven of typography nerds sitting at their computers?

Reading anything you post ... ever?
